bug.author: AbdelmajidB
bug.description:
hello, just a remark about U-Net zoo implementation, in the original paper the last convolutional layer is 1 by 1 convltuion: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11898959/64458359-09b20900-d0ed-11e9-804a-bb4f25fb7114.PNG></denchmark-link>
But in the zoo implementation is convolution of 3 by 3: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/eclipse/deeplearning4j/blob/master/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-zoo/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/zoo/model/UNet.java#L214>https://github.com/eclipse/deeplearning4j/blob/master/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-zoo/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/zoo/model/UNet.java#L214</denchmark-link>
